p: Are you passionate about clean code and modern application architecture design? Are you a technically-inclined team-player? Do you pride yourself on staying up-to-date with the latest in business application trends?
p.2: Then this job may be for you.
p.4: At Elevate HR, we believe in establishing long-term relationships with our clients and long-term careers for our employees. We believe that people are the dynamic engines of company growth. Come work hand-in-hand with Microsoft to deliver unrivaled Identity Access Management (IAM) and Human Capital Management (HCM) software and consulting solutions for companies across the globe.
p.6: As a software developer in our NY office, you will work collaboratively with product designers and other software developers to design and create new software modules, enhancements, and features for Elevate HR's business application suite. As a key member of our product team, you will work directly with business owners to shape product direction and bring new features to market.

strong: A few boxes you'll need to check:

li.1: Experience with Azure or other cloud development
li.2: Knowledge of Visual Studio, C#, .NET Core, Javascript, JSON required
li.3: Experience with front end development using JQuery, CSS, HTML 5
li.5: Ability to interpret written requirements and technical specification documents
li.6: Ability to code software according to published standards and design guidelines
li.7: Undergraduate BA or BS and/or advanced degree from a top accredited university, with an exceptional academic track record
li.8: Residence in or within easy daily commuting distance to Manhattan, NY
li.9: Authorization to work in the United States now and in the future

li: Interpret written business requirements and technical specifications
li.1: Create and maintain technical documentation using defined templates
li.2: Leverage Agile development methodology, and participate in daily scrum meetings
li.3: Develop software according to written technical specifications
li.4: Code to established standards and best practices
li.5: Perform testing of programs to established standards
li.6: Investigate, analyze, and document reported defects
li.7: Perform maintenance programming and correct identified defects

p.13: We invest time in you and help you look to your future. We offer:

li: Clear job responsibilities and multiple opportunities for team collaboration
li.1: Flexible options for your career path
li.2: Freedom to move between internal teams
li.3: Quarterly design meetings at Elevate HR offices (*when travel is supported by company policy)
li.4: Changes to access, learn, and get certified in new Microsoft technologies

p.15: Elevate HR is hiring Software Developers exclusively for our New York, NY office.
p.17: Elevate HR, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Elevate HR prohibits discrimination and harassment against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, age, religion, sex, national origin, sexual identity or expression, sexual orientation, disability, veteran, military or marital status, genetic information or any other protected status.
